channel.title: Help making shops!
channel.description: Hi I am "attempting" to create my own private server, and i'm new to java completaly. I am trying to make shops to add to my server and i'm using the Shopmaker by Jaywalker Now whenever i i put the code into my client, autospawn, and shops, i get this error when i go to run my server [code]- FigmentScape - .. Online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 1000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:37)[/code] Now when i compile things it says i have no errors. Can anyone help me as of how to fix this, or explain how to properaly make shops. This happens whenever i do it to both the sources i use. I use Pkz Scape, and D D S P 3 C. I apreciate the help! Thanks!

item.title: Help making shops!
item.dc:creator: @zhabascape zhabascape
item.description:
@zhabascape wrote:

Hi I am “attempting” to create my own private server, and i’m new to java completaly.
I am trying to make shops to add to my server and i’m using the Shopmaker by Jaywalker
Now whenever i i put the code into my client, autospawn, and shops, i get this error when i go to run my server

- FigmentScape - .. Online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 1000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:37)
Now when i compile things it says i have no errors. Can anyone help me as of how to fix this, or explain how to properaly make shops.
This happens whenever i do it to both the sources i use.
I use Pkz Scape, and D D S P 3 C.
I apreciate the help! Thanks!

Read full topic
